body_html:
So, spending some time getting more familiar with Slim, it appears that commending out some specific code in model_deploy where clone_on_cpu is checked calls into setting the GPU device has made it work.

It would be nice for this script to auto-detect available devices and not assume GPU support since a shipping, supported platform does not provide CPU support.

Thank you in advance for consideration.
